scenario_text.value: There seems to be some edible food.
It all looks so good!

You’re drooling, Agumon!
That’s disgusting...
And yet you’re drooling too, Labramon.
Don’t just go eating that, you two!

By the way... I can hear animal sounds
from somewhere deeper in the forest.

So we need to be careful searching for food
too far from here.
That’s scary!

We’ve got water and some food. There were
spices and a gas stove in the cafeteria...

(We’ve got the minimum we’ll need to
survive.)
(But will this really be enough?)
I’m worried about others.
We should be okay for now.
What is this place?

I’m worried about the others...
Saki, Shuuji, Kaito, Miu, the professor...
You’re right.

We’ve made it this far, and I’d think they’ll
be looking for this place too...
Aoi’s friends are going to be fine!

We won’t be here long.
This should be good for a while.
That’s naive, Takuma.

We aren’t just lost. We gotta survive among
unknown monsters wandering around out there.

They are not monsters!
But we cannot let our guard down.

What is this place? There’s food and water.
No power or signal, and monsters too?
It’s all too weird!

So what? Knowing what this place is
won’t get us out of here, will it?!
What we need to do is somehow call for help!
And where are all the adults?

We didn’t go that far. They’ve got to be
around here somewhere!

That’s right. Maybe more people are still lost
out there due to all this sudden weirdness.
We did find our way to the school, though...
Well, we should look around a bit more for now.
